line.comment: * Zero Hour 2.0 - can manage Unknown sectors!

line.text: 'You do not have a ship in this sector.'
'! Cannot abandon this sector rigth now.'
'! Cannot give this sector to another faction right now.'
'Cannot transfer this sector due to current '
'You must become a nation before you can transfer Unknown sectors.'

line.comment: * ZH 2.0 allows to transfer sectors regardless of rank
* $rep = $currentRace-> get notoriety title to race [Player]: text=[FALSE]

line.text: ' has been abandoned by the Independents'

line.comment: * $ship = create ship: type={Argon Buster} owner=[Phanon] addto=$sector x=-90000 y=-90000 z=-90000
* $t = 'Set Phanon as a Friend in your Global Friend/Foe settings and transmit to all property'
* = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon='no' timeout=7000 fadeout=1000
* ZH 2.0 - AI can refuse. Xenon and Phanon never refuse
* exodus factions do not want to get sectors which would put them closer to the OCV portal
* defensive factions do not want sectors near dangerous enemies
* factions which are not confident dont want isolated enclaves
* not reckless factions dont want sectors with huge enemies inside
* never refuse a sector which is being demanded in an ultimatum
* too much can break if those 2 scripts are currently active

line.text: 'Not possible at the moment. Please wait a few min (technical limitations).'

line.comment: * ZH2.0 - we always need to build a station for the new owner to prevent other scripts from reverting the new sector ownership again.
* first Phanon outpost is spawned by the PhanonCreation script which gives them starting resources
* ZH 2.0 Phanon sectors provide Xenon protection
* Mordan4 - The exception to this gift is their FIRST sector, which the player must drop a beacon in, in order to complete the "Close Bonds" mission and allow the phanon progression.
* Mordan3 - Whenever gifting a sector to the Phanon, they get a free jump beacon. This can be destroyed and will not be automatically replaced.

Zero Hour 2.0 - can manage Unknown sectors!
ZH 2.0 allows to transfer sectors regardless of rank
$rep = $currentRace-> get notoriety title to race [Player]: text=[FALSE]
$ship = create ship: type={Argon Buster} owner=[Phanon] addto=$sector x=-90000 y=-90000 z=-90000
$t = 'Set Phanon as a Friend in your Global Friend/Foe settings and transmit to all property'
= [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon='no' timeout=7000 fadeout=1000
ZH 2.0 - AI can refuse. Xenon and Phanon never refuse
exodus factions do not want to get sectors which would put them closer to the OCV portal
defensive factions do not want sectors near dangerous enemies
factions which are not confident dont want isolated enclaves
not reckless factions dont want sectors with huge enemies inside
never refuse a sector which is being demanded in an ultimatum
too much can break if those 2 scripts are currently active
ZH2.0 - we always need to build a station for the new owner to prevent other scripts from reverting the new sector ownership again.
first Phanon outpost is spawned by the PhanonCreation script which gives them starting resources
ZH 2.0 Phanon sectors provide Xenon protection
Mordan4 - The exception to this gift is their FIRST sector, which the player must drop a beacon in, in order to complete the "Close Bonds" mission and allow the phanon progression.
Mordan3 - Whenever gifting a sector to the Phanon, they get a free jump beacon. This can be destroyed and will not be automatically replaced.
